title: Should You Text ‘Count Me’ to 89800 to Support the Women’s March?
subtitle: A third-party organization has urged Women's March participants to text "COUNT ME" to 89800 to be tallied, but the event's organizers have not endorsed the effort.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Women's March on Washington is tallying attendees by asking them to text "COUNT ME" to 89800.
